mapper.select: SELECT * FROM person FETCH NEXT 20 ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO person(user_id, person_name, person_phone, person_email, is_Gender, address, degree, career, created_At ) VALUE(#{userId}, #{personName}, #{personPhone}, #{personEmail}, #{isGender}, #{address}, #{degree}, #{career}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT person_id FROM person WHERE degree = #{degree} FETCH NEXT 20 ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(subject_id) AS subjectId, FIRST.*, person_skill.skill FROM recommend LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT person.user_id, person.person_id, person.person_name, resume.resume_title, person.career, person.address FROM person LEFT OUTER JOIN resume ON person.person_id = resume.person_id ) FIRST ON recommend.subject_id = FIRST.user_id LEFT OUTER JOIN person_skill ON FIRST.person_id = person_skill.person_id GROUP BY (subject_id) ORDER BY subject_id
